article.title: Houston U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Houston U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Mickey Leland Federal Building
1919 Smith St. suite 1026
Houston, TX 77002
There is metered parking under I-45 on the corner of Louisiana and Pierce
Map​​

Phone: (713) 209-3104
Fax: (713) 209-3135

See below for a listing of your local Houston International Trade Specialists.​
_____________________________________________________________________________________

Houston Staff

  • Steve Recobs, Director
    Phone: (713) 209-3105
    Fax: (713) 209-3135

  • Ms. Danielle Caltabiano, Senior International Trade Specialist
    Phone: (713) 209-3110
    Fax: (713) 209-3135

  • Ms. Nyamusi Igambi, Senior International Trade Specialist
    Phone: (713) 209-3112
    Fax: (713) 209-3135

  • Mr. Brendan Kelly, Senior International Trade Specialist
    Phone: (713) 209-3113
    Fax: (713) 209-3135

  • Ms. Pam Plagens, Senior International Trade Specialist
    Phone: (713) 209-3106
    Fax: (713) 209-3135

  • Mr. Alan Richel, Senior International Trade Specialist
    Cell Phone: (832)248-1556
    All industries within the following zip codes within Harris County:77014, 77032, 77060, 77065, 77066, 77067, 77068, 77069, 77070, 77073, 77090, 77336, 77338, 77339, 77345, 77346, 77373, 77375, 77377, 77379, 77386, 77388, 77389, 77396
    And all industries in the following counties:
    Brazos, Grimes, Houston, Jasper, Leon, Madison, Montgomery, Newton, Polk, San Jacinto, Trinity, Tyler, Walker, Waller, Washington

_________________________________________________________________________


The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office.For immediate assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am – 6:00 pm Eastern time. 1-800-USA-TRADE (1 800 872-8723)​​.

​
